title: Eexperience a Noble Bedouin Hospitality Iftar at Jannah Burj Al-Sarab
text:
(MENAFN Press) This Ramadan, the five-star wonder hotel Jannah Burj Al-Sarab invites all guests to enjoy the last most wonderful days of the holy month in a totally noble Bedouin hospitality atmosphere.

CEO Mr. Nehme Imad Darwiche, said, "The holy month is the perfect occasion to reflect and indulge in quality time with family and loved ones. Share with each other the captivating traditions and cultures of the region and create a celebration to remember. Add an essence of elegance with the enriching Iftar meal."

Accommodating over 30 guests, the Ramadan Majlis is set in an unforgettable atmosphere, filled with fantastic Ramadan theme, "Guests can enjoy a traditional Iftar buffet along with international specialties and drinks with friends and family every evening during the holy month."

Adding up, Jannah Burj Al-Sarab, has dedicated the 9th of July to host a special iftar ceremony for media partners. And Monday the 13th as the "Special bloggers day" as we influential bloggers in Abu Dhabi and the world are invited to enjoy an impressive day with the Jannah hotel team including an iftar gathering.

Reach the hotel on 800-JANNAH and book with us an amazing Ramadan experience.
